item.description: Hey everyone! It's time for our annual Howl-o-ween Costume Party. Sunday October 23rd from 11:00am-1:00pm. We'll have lots of Fun Games & Activities to Celebrate this Spooky Season! The kids will get to Bob for Apples, Show off their best tricks during Trick Or Treat, Sing along with the counselors for the Haunted Howling Contest, & practice the Spider Web Crawl. Proof of Current Vaccines Required: Rabies, DHLPP, Bordatella
item.name: Howl-o-Ween Costume Party!
